languages.text: "Цвета проктора всегда были непреклонны. Он не смог бы жить, если бы смешал свои оттенки с серостью".

traits.locale_text: "Цвета проктора всегда были непреклонны. Он не смог бы жить, если бы смешал свои оттенки с серостью".

languages.text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."
languages.original_text: "Цвета проктора всегда были непреклонны. Он не смог бы жить, если бы смешал свои оттенки с серостью".

traits.locale_text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."
"The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."
"The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."
"The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."
"The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."
"The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."

languages.text: 「代理人の色は一度たりとも揺らぎませんでした。もし灰色に濁ることを許していたら、彼は自分を許せなかったでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."

traits.locale_text: 「代理人の色は一度たりとも揺らぎませんでした。もし灰色に濁ることを許していたら、彼は自分を許せなかったでしょう」

languages.text: "Die Farben des Proktors haben kein einziges Mal gewankt. Er könnte nicht mit sich leben, hätte er zugelassen, dass sie sich mit Grau vermischen."
languages.original_text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."

traits.locale_text: "Die Farben des Proktors haben kein einziges Mal gewankt. Er könnte nicht mit sich leben, hätte er zugelassen, dass sie sich mit Grau vermischen."

languages.text: « Les couleurs du proctor ne se sont pas altérées une seule fois. S'il leur avait permis de se mélanger au gris, il ne se le serait jamais pardonné. »
languages.original_text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."

traits.locale_text: « Les couleurs du proctor ne se sont pas altérées une seule fois. S'il leur avait permis de se mélanger au gris, il ne se le serait jamais pardonné. »

languages.text: «Los colores del Procurador no cambiaron ni una sola vez. No habría sido capaz de vivir consigo mismo de haber permitido que se mezclasen con el gris».
languages.original_text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."

traits.locale_text: «Los colores del Procurador no cambiaron ni una sola vez. No habría sido capaz de vivir consigo mismo de haber permitido que se mezclasen con el gris».

languages.text: “那位监察官的颜色从来都没有改变过。如果他将自己的颜色与灰色混同起来，那他恐怕再也无法容忍自己的存在。”
languages.original_text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."

traits.locale_text: “那位监察官的颜色从来都没有改变过。如果他将自己的颜色与灰色混同起来，那他恐怕再也无法容忍自己的存在。”

languages.text: "Üsteğmen'in renkleri bir ton bile atmadı. Şayet griye dönseydi o hâlde yaşamaya tahammül edemezdi."
languages.original_text: "The Proctor's colours never once wavered. He would not be able to live with himself had he allowed them to be mixed with grey."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen'in renkleri bir ton bile atmadı. Şayet griye dönse o hâlde yaşamaya tahammül edemezdi."
